verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> [month] in the first עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year בַּשְּׁלִישִׁ֖י <S%H7992><s%> in the third בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֱמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הֲמוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H1995><s%> and to his multitude אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> are you דָּמִ֥יתָ <S%H1819><s%> Whom art thou like בְגָדְלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1433><s%> greatness

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַשּׁ֜וּר <S%H804><s%> Behold the Assyrian אֶ֣רֶז <S%H730><s%> [was] a cedar בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <S%H3844><s%> in Lebanon יְפֵ֥ה <S%H3303><s%> with fair עָנָ֛ף <S%H6057><s%> branches וְחֹ֥רֶשׁ <S%H2793><s%> shroud מֵצַ֖ל <S%H6751><s%> and with a shadowing וּגְבַ֣הּ <S%H1362><s%> and of an high קוֹמָ֑ה <S%H6967><s%> stature וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> was among עֲבֹתִ֔ים <S%H5688><s%> was among the thick boughs הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become צַמַּרְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6788><s%> and his top

מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> The waters גִּדְּל֔וּהוּ <S%H1431><s%> made him great תְּה֖וֹם <S%H8415><s%> the deep רֹֽמְמָ֑תְהוּ <S%H7311><s%> set him up on high אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for נַהֲרֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H5104><s%> with her rivers הֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> running סְבִיב֣וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about מַטָּעָ֔הּ <S%H4302><s%> his plants וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּעָלֹתֶ֣יהָ <S%H8585><s%> her little rivers שִׁלְחָ֔ה <S%H7971><s%> and sent out אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> unto all the trees הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that גָּבְהָ֣א <S%H1361><s%> was exalted קֹמָת֔וֹ <S%H6967><s%> Therefore his height מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> above all the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וַתִּרְבֶּ֨ינָה <S%H7235><s%> were multiplied סַֽרְעַפֹּתָ֜יו <S%H5634><s%> and his boughs וַתֶּאֱרַ֧כְנָה <S%H748><s%> became long [פֹארֹתֹו כ] (פֹארֹתָ֛יו <S%H6288><s%> bough ק) מִמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> of waters רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> because of the multitude בְּשַׁלְּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7971><s%> when he shot forth

בִּסְעַפֹּתָ֤יו <S%H5589><s%> in his boughs קִֽנְנוּ֙ <S%H7077><s%> made their nests כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> All the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְתַ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under פֹּֽארֹתָיו֙ <S%H6288><s%> and under his branches יָֽלְד֔וּ <S%H3205><s%> bring forth their young כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> did all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וּבְצִלּוֹ֙ <S%H6738><s%> and under his shadow יֵֽשְׁב֔וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> all great

וַיְּיִ֣ף <S%H3302><s%> Thus was he fair בְּגָדְל֔וֹ <S%H1433><s%> in his greatness בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> in the length דָּֽלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <S%H1808><s%> of his branches כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> extended שָׁרְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H8328><s%> for his root אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> was by great

אֲרָזִ֣ים <S%H730><s%> The cedars לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not עֲמָמֻהוּ֮ <S%H6004><s%> could not hide בְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> in the garden אֱלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> of God בְּרוֹשִׁ֗ים <S%H1265><s%> him the fir trees לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not דָמוּ֙ <S%H1819><s%> were not like אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with סְעַפֹּתָ֔יו <S%H5589><s%> his boughs וְעַרְמֹנִ֥ים <S%H6196><s%> and the chesnut trees לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּפֹֽארֹתָ֑יו <S%H6288><s%> were not like his branches כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner עֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> nor any tree בְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> in the garden אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> could דָמָ֥ה <S%H1819><s%> was like אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> in בְּיָפְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H3308><s%> unto him in his beauty

יָפֶ֣ה <S%H3303><s%> him fair עֲשִׂיתִ֔יו <S%H6213><s%> I have made בְּרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> by the multitude דָּֽלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <S%H1808><s%> of his branches וַיְקַנְאֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7065><s%> envied כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> so that all the trees עֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּגַ֥ן <S%H1588><s%> that [were] in the garden הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֕עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> it גָּבַ֖הְתָּ <S%H1361><s%> Because thou hast lifted up בְּקוֹמָ֑ה <S%H6967><s%> thyself in height וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> and he hath shot up צַמַּרְתּוֹ֙ <S%H6788><s%> his top אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among עֲבוֹתִ֔ים <S%H5688><s%> among the thick boughs וְרָ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> is lifted up לְבָב֖וֹ <S%H3824><s%> and his heart בְּגָבְהֽוֹ׃ <S%H1363><s%> in his height

וְאֶ֨תְּנֵ֔הוּ <S%H5414><s%> I have therefore delivered בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> him into the hand אֵ֣יל <S%H410><s%> of the mighty one גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen עָשׂ֤וֹ <S%H6213><s%> he shall surely יַֽעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> deal ל֔וֹ כְּרִשְׁע֖וֹ <S%H7562><s%> for his wickedness גֵּרַשְׁתִּֽהוּ׃ <S%H1644><s%> with him I have driven him out

וַיִּכְרְתֻ֧הוּ <S%H3772><s%> have cut him off זָרִ֛ים <S%H2114><s%> And strangers עָרִיצֵ֥י <S%H6184><s%> the terrible גוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations וַֽיִּטְּשֻׁ֑הוּ <S%H5203><s%> and have left אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הֶ֠הָרִים <S%H2022><s%> him upon the mountains וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גֵּ֨אָי֜וֹת <S%H1516><s%> and in all the valleys נָפְל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> are fallen דָלִיּוֹתָ֗יו <S%H1808><s%> his branches וַתִּשָּׁבַ֤רְנָה <S%H7665><s%> are broken פֹֽארֹתָיו֙ <S%H6288><s%> and his boughs בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲפִיקֵ֣י <S%H650><s%> by all the rivers הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וַיֵּרְד֧וּ <S%H3381><s%> are gone down מִצִּלּ֛וֹ <S%H6738><s%> from his shadow כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַמֵּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> and all the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וַֽיִּטְּשֻֽׁהוּ׃ <S%H5203><s%> and have left

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מַפַּלְתּ֥וֹ <S%H4658><s%> Upon his ruin יִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <S%H7931><s%> remain כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> shall all the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> will be on פֹּארֹתָ֣יו <S%H6288><s%> shall be upon his branches הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> and all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

לְמַ֡עַן <S%H4616><s%> so אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִגְבְּה֨וּ <S%H1361><s%> exalt בְקוֹמָתָ֜ם <S%H6967><s%> themselves for their height כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> To the end that none of all the trees מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> by the waters וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> neither shoot up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַמַּרְתָּם֙ <S%H6788><s%> their top אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among עֲבֹתִ֔ים <S%H5688><s%> among the thick boughs וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יַעַמְד֧וּ <S%H5975><s%> stand up אֵלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H352><s%> neither their trees בְּגָבְהָ֖ם <S%H1363><s%> in their height כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> have all שֹׁ֣תֵי <S%H8354><s%> all that drink מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> water כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that כֻלָּם֩ <S%H3605><s%> all נִתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> for they are all delivered לַמָּ֜וֶת <S%H4194><s%> unto death אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תַּחְתִּ֗ית <S%H8482><s%> to the nether parts בְּת֛וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of men אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with י֥וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> to the pit ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day רִדְתּ֤וֹ <S%H3381><s%> when he went down שְׁא֙וֹלָה֙ <S%H7585><s%> to the grave הֶאֱבַ֜לְתִּי <S%H56><s%> I caused a mourning כִּסֵּ֤תִי <S%H3680><s%> I covered עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּה֔וֹם <S%H8415><s%> the deep וָֽאֶמְנַע֙ <S%H4513><s%> for him and I restrained נַהֲרוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5104><s%> the floods וַיִּכָּלְא֖וּ <S%H3607><s%> were stayed מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> thereof and the great וָאַקְדִּ֤ר <S%H6937><s%> to mourn עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> account לְבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> and I caused Lebanon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> for him and all the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> over עֻלְפֶּֽה׃ <S%H5969><s%> fainted

מִקּ֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> at the sound מַפַּלְתּוֹ֙ <S%H4658><s%> of his fall הִרְעַ֣שְׁתִּי <S%H7493><s%> to shake גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> I made the nations בְּהוֹרִדִ֥י <S%H3381><s%> when I cast him down אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> שְׁא֖וֹלָה <S%H7585><s%> to hell אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for י֣וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that descend ב֑וֹר <S%H953><s%> into the pit וַיִּנָּ֨חֲמ֜וּ <S%H5162><s%> shall be comforted בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תַּחְתִּית֙ <S%H8482><s%> in the nether parts כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> and all the trees עֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden מִבְחַ֥ר <S%H4005><s%> the choice וְטוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> and best לְבָנ֖וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שֹׁ֥תֵי <S%H8354><s%> all that drink מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> like אִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> for יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> They also went down שְׁא֖וֹלָה <S%H7585><s%> into hell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> with him unto [them that be] slain חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וּזְרֹע֛וֹ <S%H2220><s%> and [they that were] his arm יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> [that] dwelt בְצִלּ֖וֹ <S%H6738><s%> under his shadow בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִ֨י <S%H4310><s%> which דָמִ֥יתָ <S%H1819><s%> To whom art thou thus like כָּ֛כָה <S%H3602><s%> thus בְּכָב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> in glory וּבְגֹ֖דֶל <S%H1433><s%> and in greatness בַּעֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> among the trees עֵ֑דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden וְהוּרַדְתָּ֨ <S%H3381><s%> down אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> with the trees עֵ֜דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תַּחְתִּ֗ית <S%H8482><s%> unto the nether parts בְּת֨וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst עֲרֵלִ֤ים <S%H6189><s%> of the uncircumcised תִּשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> thou shalt lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> with [them that be] slain חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> This [is] Pharaoh וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הֲמוֹנֹ֔ה <S%H1995><s%> and all his multitude נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס
